May 24th4
Frankfort
Hon. E. M. Stanton
Secretary of War
Washington D.C
If the following meets your approbation please advise me.

On June First (1st) I can consolidate all six months volunteers into regiments. The residue of ten thousand men I will fill up with three months militia -- whose service our laws authorize me to enforce -- when their term expires I will replace them with others -- making the full six months service. They should be mustered into U S service. The draft has crippled recruiting, and we may be unable to get enough volunteers soon enough for you.
Tho E Bramlette Gov of Ky
